Description: Laureate bust of Hadrian, right, with traces of drapery on far shoulder to front of neck. (obverse)
Aegyptos, draped, reclining left, holding sistrum in right hand, left arm resting on basket of fruit, to left ibis standing right on low column. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Roman Empire Ancient Greece and Rome: Roman Empire
Bibliographic references: RE3 / Coins of the Roman Empire in the British Museum, vol.III: Nerva to Hadrian (1693, p.504)
Strack (Hadrian) / Die Reichspraegung zur Zeit des Hadrian (707)
RIC2 / The Roman imperial coinage, vol. 2: Vespasian to Hadrian (838, p.445)
RIC2.3 / The Roman Imperial Coinage, vol. II - part 3 from AD 117-138 Hadrian (1592)
